name: Mislight
description:
Use the powers of your flashlight to light up the shadow creatures that roam trought the forest and seek your way out!



  • Use the flashlight as your main weapon of defeating the shadow creatures.
  • Shoot, dodge or counter the bullet hell-like attacks of all your enemies to survive.
  • Gain Light Drops by defeating enemies to become stronger or use them to buy items, upgrades and costumes.
  • Navigate through the 5 areas of the forest to find your way out.
  • Defeat strong enemies to rescue the spirits of children trapped in the shadow's realm.
  • Find the secret pages hidden throught the forest to learn more about events that transpired before your arrival.
  • Unlock new powers and use them to clear puzzles blocking your path.



-Have you ever heard stories of monsters living under the bed?
- What about legends of shadow figures who kidnap inocent children?

On a quiet night like any other, a little girl had the misfortune of experiencing the visit of a shadow being - The Forgotten - and is taken to a dark forest in the realm of this creature. Now she has to find a way out before the shadows take her soul.

Navigate throught the forest with help of your new friends, fight with a magical flashlight to be your light and learn about the fate of your long lost sister and her sudden disapearance.
